text: Jakub Chrpa (born February 13, 1994) is a Czech professional ice hockey player. He is currently playing for Piráti Chomutov of the Czech Extraliga. Chrpa made his Czech Extraliga debut playing with Piráti Chomutov during the 2015-16 Czech Extraliga season. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Piráti Chomutov players Category:Czech ice hockey forwards
title: Jakub Chrpa
